tool.name: anvi-db-info
tool.description: Access self tables, display values, or set new ones totally on your own risk.

param.name: input
param.label: Input
param.help: An anvi'o database for pan, profile, contigs, or auxiliary data

param.name: self_key
param.label: Self Key
param.help: The key you wish to set or change.

param.name: self_value
param.label: Self Value
param.help: The value you wish to set for the self key.

tool.help:
usage: anvi-db-info [-h] [--self-key SELF_KEY] [--self-value SELF_VALUE] [--just-do-it] DATABASE_PATH
Access self tables, display values, or set new ones totally on your own risk.
positional arguments: DATABASE_PATH An anvi'o database for pan, profile, contigs, or auxiliary data
optional arguments: -h, --help show this help message and exit --self-key SELF_KEY The key you wish to set or change. --self-value SELF_VALUE The value you wish to set for the self key. --just-do-it Don't bother me with questions or warnings, just do it.
Input: The database path you wish to access.
Very dangerous zone: For power users with extreme self-control and maturity.
